pullRequest.title: CLDR-14268 improve vetting participation page
pullRequest.bodyText:
CLDR-14268

major rewrite of 'vetting participation' to a speedy query + new UI (non JSP)
also fix Utilka CLDR-6320
also cleanup a leaking Statement from UserRegistry

beforeCommit.message:
CLDR-14268 improve vetting participation page

- major rewrite of 'vetting participation' to a speedy query + new UI (non JSP)
- also fix Utilka CLDR-6320
- also cleanup a leaking Statement from UserRegistry

afterCommit.message:
CLDR-14268 improve vetting participation page

- major rewrite of 'vetting participation' to a speedy query + new UI (non JSP)
- also fix Utilka CLDR-6320
- also cleanup a leaking Statement from UserRegistry

nodes.bodyText: getJson is over 100 lines, way more than one screenful -- shorter methods with subroutines are more maintainable
Hard to see what changed other than whitespace...

@@ -0,0 +1,208 @@
+'use strict';
+
+/**
+ * Based on specials/forum.js
+ *
+ * TODO: use modern JavaScript -- import/export, not define
+ * TODO: avoid dependencies on legacy code
+ * TODO: put code for progress bar, etc., in a shared module, share with, e.g., vsummary.js
+ */
+define("js/special/vetting_participation.js", ["js/special/SpecialPage.js"], function(SpecialPage) {
+	var _super;
+	
+	'use strict';
+
+	const tableId = "vettingParticipationTable";
+	const fileName = "vettingParticipation.csv";
+	const onclick = "cldrStCsvFromTable.downloadCsv("
+		+ "\"" + tableId + "\""
+		+ ", "
+		+ "\"" + fileName + "\""
+		+ ")";
+
+
+
+	function Page() {
+		// constructor
+	}
+	
+	/**
+	 * Fetch the Forum Participation data from the server, and "load" it

nodes.bodyText: show() is over 100 lines, way more than one screenful -- could improve with subroutines

+

+	const fileName = "vettingParticipation.csv";
+	const onclick = "cldrStCsvFromTable.downloadCsv("

+		+ ", "
+		+ "\"" + fileName + "\""

+	 * Fetch the Forum Participation data from the server, and "load" it
+	 *
+	 * @param params an object with various properties; see SpecialPage.js
+	 */
+	function show(params) {

beforeCommit.message:
CLDR-14268 improve vetting participation page

- major rewrite of 'vetting participation' to a speedy query + new UI (non JSP)
- also fix Utilka CLDR-6320
- also cleanup a leaking Statement from UserRegistry

- also cleanup a leaking Statement from UserRegistry

commit.message:
CLDR-14268 improve vetting participation page

- major rewrite of 'vetting participation' to a speedy query + new UI (non JSP)
- also fix Utilka CLDR-6320
- also cleanup a leaking Statement from UserRegistry

beforeCommit.message:
CLDR-14268 improve vetting participation page

- major rewrite of 'vetting participation' to a speedy query + new UI (non JSP)
- also fix Utilka CLDR-6320
- also cleanup a leaking Statement from UserRegistry

afterCommit.message:
CLDR-14268 improve vetting participation page

- major rewrite of 'vetting participation' to a speedy query + new UI (non JSP)
- also fix Utilka CLDR-6320
